00017 from wx import TextCtrl, TE_MULTILINE, TextAttr
00018 
00019 class consoleLog(TextCtrl):
00020     def __init__(self, master):
00021         TextCtrl.__init__(self, master, style = TE_MULTILINE)
00022         self.master = master
00023         self.SetBackgroundColour("Black")          # TODO: move into settings object
00024         self.SetDefaultStyle(TextAttr("GREEN"))    # TODO: move into settings object
00025 
00026         self.write("Tkad started!\n\n")
00027         
00028     def write(self, string):    
00029         self.AppendText(string)
